name: Xmas Run
description:
Description:
• Xmas Run is a funny fast-paced game in which you are Santa Claus and you must collect presents from roofs of houses. The game is pretty simple to play, you only have to press the "UP" Arrow Key in order to jump from house to house. On your way, you will have to collect the shiny presents and avoid the chimneys smoke that will slow you down. For each gift you collect, you will be granted 10 points; If you happen to find a gingerbread, you will get 50 points! You can pause the game anytime by pressing the "P" Key. As time passes by, the game will become much faster and you must be more precise on the actions you take! Good Luck and Happy Holidays!

Instructions:
Move with Arrow Keys.
Pause the game with 'P' key.

Game Dimensions: 640x400

Game Category: Action, Arcade, Education, Strategy, Other

Movement: Arrow Keys
Fire / Action: Not Available
Jump: Up Arrow
